abstract: The senator, also the Democratic chairman of the Banking Committee, plans to unveil his bill to overhaul the nation’s financial regulations next week after months of negotiations with Republicans.
snippet: The senator, also the Democratic chairman of the Banking Committee, plans to unveil his bill to overhaul the nation’s financial regulations next week after months of negotiations with Republicans.
lead_paragraph: Senator Christopher J. Dodd, the Democratic chairman of the Senate Banking Committee, plans to unveil his bill to overhaul the nation’s financial regulations next week after months of negotiations with Republicans, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: Dodd to Unveil Bill on Financial Regulations
